name: Cube revenge (Idkwtph)
description:
Cube revenge (or "I don't know what to put here") is a game for a game jam

Your goal is to get as high score as possible by doing "combo" (you can just spam 2 buttons if you want) {my most used is "1 up + 2 + 1"}

you only have 2 main skills but they can be used in 2-3 different ways

there are 2 main and 2 special ennemies and when you can just spam at them, they have their weak sides that you should exploit in order to get the higest score

game doesn't have any sounds effect/music so i recommend just playing some music on youtube or something like that

and last thing ...don't take this game seriously
